Segment.name: RAB
Segment.comment: To indicate codes qualifying rates and the minimums

Field.name: RateValueQualifier1
Field.comment: Code qualifying how to extend charges or interpret value

Field.name: AssignedNumber1
Field.comment: Number assigned for differentiation within a transaction set

Field.name: AlternationPrecedenceCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the priority of rate application when two or more rates apply to a given movement; if rate application includes two or more rates of the same value for this element, individual carrier rules and procedures shall govern

Field.name: RateValueQualifier2
Field.comment: Code qualifying how to extend charges or interpret value

Field.name: MinimumWeightLogic
Field.comment: Code indicating the type of minimum weight or units applicable to a specific rate; the code also describes the interpretation and/or relationship of minimum weight and car capacity percentage data elements for a specific rate

Field.name: LoadingRestriction1
Field.comment: A number indicating the minimum, maximum or threshold quantity of units which must be met in order to qualify rate application

Field.name: LoadingRestriction2
Field.comment: A number indicating the minimum, maximum or threshold quantity of units which must be met in order to qualify rate application

Field.name: UnitConversionFactor
Field.comment: Identifies the weight in pounds of units specified by data element 122 Applicable to Rates

Field.name: AssignedNumber2
Field.comment: Number assigned for differentiation within a transaction set
